item.title: SCOOP: House Republicans revive push to impeach 'activist' judges after Johnson's green light
item.description: House conservatives revive their impeachment push after Speaker Mike Johnson signals support for targeting federal judges.

item.title: Trump vows heavy campaign push for GOP, cites ‘midterm curse’ for sitting presidents
item.description: Trump promises "a lot" of campaign travel for GOP midterms as Republicans work to defend their narrow majorities in House and Senate races nationwide.

item.title: Anti-ICE Minnesota agitator arrested days after daring Bondi to do so

item.title: Border Patrol union chief touts high morale despite clashes with agitators: 'They are patriotic'

item.title: WATCH: Former ICE director reveals what goes into agency’s decisions on cities to target
item.description: Former acting U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement Director John Sandweg shared insight about how the agency selects the next city for operations.
